articles.author: Callum Crumlish
articles.title: James Caan on bitter feud that 'prevented' Elf 2 from being made - Express
articles.description: JAMES CAAN stunned viewers with his performance in the 2003 film Elf, so much so that they wanted to see more. Unfortunately, his return was stopped as an on-set 'feud' prevented an Elf sequel from being made.
